reference.title: GET /dynamic_search/searches/{handle}/results
reference.shortdesc: Gets the specific search performed by this user.

refsyn.p: Gets the specific search performed by this user.

entry.p: Optional - Use this parameter to restrict the number of elements that are returned in the list to a specified range. The list is indexed starting at zero.
Optional - This parameter is used to restrict the elements in a list base on the contents of various fields.
Optional - This parameter is used to sort the elements in a list.
A list of searches that the user has made.
No search was found with the provided handle

refsyn.title: Response Description
refsyn.p:
A List of ResultRowDTOs, with a column structure that matches the one described in the corresponding ResultHeader object
columns - Contains a map of columns and their values, both as strings.

refsyn.title: Response Sample
